title: Samples, ca. 1925
medium:
Medium: mercerized cotton on linen
Technique: embroidered
description: Two examples of student work using patterns from Chiara Cernetti Battistelli's "Guida pratica per l'insegnamento del punto di Assisi" from 1925. Component "a" is taken from page 72, plate IX. Component "b" uses a pattern on page 68, plate VIII.

tombstone.epitaph:
Samples, ca. 1925.
ca. 1925. Medium: mercerized cotton on linen
Technique: embroidered. Gift of Annie May Hegeman. 1944-71-11-a/b.
